name: thedailybeast
text: NEW: Administration officials, aides, GOP operatives, and friends came to President Trump’s defense, admitting the commander in chief often makes tone-deaf comments about soldiers, claiming it's because he hates war, not the service members themselves https://t.co/fUYzbd1rlY

name: thedailybeast
text: RT @NoahShachtman: BREAK: Trump's defenders try out a new argument... he doesn’t really hate the troops, he’s just ‘an asshole’ https://t.co/TORkXTGNfh

name: thedailybeast
text: RT @HCTrudo: From ⁦@swin24⁩: “Others would only speak on-background and in an anonymous capacity—even after the White House trashed the magazine for relying on such nameless sources.” https://t.co/PFzQOwtbrJ

name: thedailybeast
text: RT @swin24: Trump says dickish things, about troops and others, all the time. In public. Behind closed doors. I’d still argue that in the past 24 hours, when we’re talking about Trump and American war dead, this is the most salient aspect: https://t.co/SeMiMsH9jF https://t.co/Zonk3mdOeu

name: thedailybeast
text: “The president means no disrespect to our troops; it’s just that the way he speaks, he can sound like an asshole sometimes,” one of these sources told The Daily Beast. “That’s how he is [when the cameras are off]…It’s his style.” https://t.co/fUYzbd1rlY

name: thedailybeast
text: Asked about Trump’s comments on late senator John McCain being a “loser” because he was “captured” and tortured during the Vietnam War, top adviser Jason Miller replied: “The president has always shown the utmost respect for those defending our country.” https://t.co/lmjiOckyDy

name: thedailybeast
text:
But Trump has managed to shambolically fumble his outreach to grieving families.

In 2017, when the president spoke to the widow of Army Sgt. La David Johnson, Trump reportedly said to her: “He knew what he signed up for, but I guess it still hurt.” https://t.co/lmjiOckyDy

name: thedailybeast
text: Read more about Trump’s “asshole” behavior and his allies' interesting defense of him in @swin24's story here: https://t.co/lmjiOckyDy

name: thedailybeast
text:
⚡️ “Trump’s Defenders: He Doesn't Hate the Troops, He's Just ‘an Asshole’”

name: thedailybeast
text: Kyle Rittenhouse's attorney argued in now-deleted tweets that the Kenosha shooter is the first hero of a new American Revolution https://t.co/WcojUWbbCA
